title: Time to Show My True Power
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Yoshiko-san, I need to talk to you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane. What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I heard about it from Ayumu-san and the others. That you’re being chased by an army of angels, Yohane-san.... Does the rest of Aqours know of this? I thought it may be hard for you to seek help from them because they’re your close friends. So I came to say that we want to be of help to you if you don’t mind<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>....Ayumu and the others.... Did anyone else say it other than her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh? Setsuna-san did, but.... Ah! Was it something that shouldn’t be mentioned so carelessly!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ku.... Kukuku.... Ayumu and Setsuna are too naive. You too, Shioriko. Do you think this Yohane would be defeated by an army of angels!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Your powers are that strong, Yohane-san....!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Let me tell you. Right now, the one in danger is not Yohane, but instead.... you guys are! You’ve stuck out your necks out into my battle, after all....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Oh no! That’s terrible, I have to let Ayumu-san and the others know immediately. Umm, what should we do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>If you become one of Yohane’s little demons, then I would have no choice but to protect you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’ll be one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
